ThingDef.label: saberfish
ThingDef.description: Provides a lot of meat and a small amount of usable hide.

ThingDef.label: redfin tuna
ThingDef.description: Provides a fair amount of meat, and a small amount of hide.

ThingDef.label: ice flounder
ThingDef.description: Provides a very small amount of meat and leather.

ThingDef.label: alligar
ThingDef.description: Provides a moderate amount of meat and leather.

ThingDef.label: breadmouth bass
ThingDef.description: Provides a small amount of meat and a small amount of leather.

ThingDef.label: killer catfish
ThingDef.description: Provides a decent amount of meat and a fair amount of light leather.

ThingDef.label: death sturgeon
ThingDef.description: Provides a fair amount of meat and a lot of leather.
